00412 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, const byte* buff, uint16 len ) 
00413       : m_paramID( paramID ), m_buff( buff, buff + len )
00414 {
00415 }
00416 
00417 
00418 inline NParam::NParam( const NParam& other ) {
00419    m_paramID = other.m_paramID;
00420    m_buff = other.m_buff;
00421 }
00422 
00423 
00424 inline void
00425 NParam::addByte( byte data ) {
00426    m_buff.push_back( data );
00427 }
00428 
00429 
00430 inline void 
00431 NParam::addUint16( uint16 data ) {
00432    m_buff.push_back( ( data ) >> 8 );
00433    m_buff.push_back( ( data ) & 0xff );
00434 }
00435 
00436 inline void
00437 NParam::addUint32ToByteVector( vector<byte>& v, uint32 d ) {
00438    v.push_back( (( d ) >> 24 ) & 0xff );
00439    v.push_back( (( d ) >> 16 ) & 0xff );
00440    v.push_back( (( d ) >> 8  ) & 0xff );
00441    v.push_back( (( d ) )       & 0xff );
00442 }
00443 
00444 inline void 
00445 NParam::addUint32( uint32 data ) {
00446    addUint32ToByteVector( m_buff, data );
00447 }
00448 
00449 inline void 
00450 NParam::addInt32( int32 data ) {
00451    addUint32( data );
00452 }
00453 
00454 
00455 inline void 
00456 NParam::addByteArray( const byte* buff, uint16 len ) {
00457    m_buff.insert( m_buff.end(), buff, buff + len );
00458 }
00459 
00460 inline void 
00461 NParam::addByteArray( const char* buff, uint16 len ) {
00462    m_buff.insert( m_buff.end(), reinterpret_cast<const byte*>( buff ), 
00463                   reinterpret_cast<const byte*>( buff ) + len );
00464 }
00465 
00466 inline void
00467 NParam::addString( const char* str, bool usesLatin1 ) {
00468    MC2String tmp;
00469    if( usesLatin1 ) {
00470       tmp = UTF8Util::mc2ToIso(MC2String(str));
00471    } else {
00472       tmp = UTF8Util::mc2ToUtf8(MC2String(str));
00473    }
00474    m_buff.insert( m_buff.end(), tmp.c_str(), tmp.c_str() + tmp.size() + 1 );
00475 }
00476 
00477 
00478 inline void
00479 NParam::addString( const MC2String& str, bool usesLatin1 ) {
00480    MC2String tmp;
00481    if( usesLatin1 ) {
00482       tmp = UTF8Util::mc2ToIso(str);
00483    } else {
00484       tmp = UTF8Util::mc2ToUtf8(str);
00485    }
00486    m_buff.insert( m_buff.end(), tmp.c_str(), tmp.c_str() + tmp.size() + 1);
00487 }

00490 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, bool data ) 
00491       : m_paramID( paramID )
00492 {
00493    if ( !data ) {
00494       m_buff.push_back( data );
00495    }
00496 }

00542 
00543 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, const uint16* data, uint16 len )
00544       : m_paramID( paramID )
00545 {
00546    m_buff.reserve( len*2 );
00547    for ( uint16 i = 0 ; i < len ; ++i ) {
00548       addUint16( data[ i ] );
00549    }
00550 }
00551 
00552 
00553 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, const uint32* data, uint16 len )
00554       : m_paramID( paramID )
00555 {
00556    m_buff.reserve( len*4 );
00557    for ( uint16 i = 0 ; i < len ; ++i ) {
00558       addUint32( data[ i ] );
00559    }
00560 }
00561 
00562 
00563 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, const int32* data, uint16 len )
00564       : m_paramID( paramID )
00565 {
00566    m_buff.reserve( len*4 );
00567    for ( uint16 i = 0 ; i < len ; ++i ) {
00568       addInt32( data[ i ] );
00569    }
00570 }

00572 
00573 inline NParam::NParam( uint16 paramID, MC2Coordinate data )
00574       : m_paramID( paramID )
00575 {
00576    Nav2Coordinate nav2Coord(data);
00577    addInt32( nav2Coord.nav2lat );
00578    addInt32( nav2Coord.nav2lon );
00579 }

00600 inline uint16 
00601 NParam::getLength() const {
00602    return m_buff.size();

00606 inline const byte* 
00607 NParam::getBuff() const {
00608    return &m_buff.front();

00611 
00612 inline bool 
00613 NParam::getBool() const {
00614    if ( getLength() == 0 ) {
00615       return true;
00616    } else {
00617       return m_buff[ 0 ] != 0;
00618    }
00619 }

00621 inline byte 
00622 NParam::getByte( uint16 index ) const {
00623    return m_buff[ index ];
00624 }
00625 
00626 inline byte 
00627 NParam::incGetByte( uint32& index ) const {
00628    return m_buff[ index++ ];
00629 }
00630 
00631 inline uint16 
00632 NParam::getUint16( uint16 index ) const {
00633    return ntohs(*((uint16 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00634 }
00635 
00636 inline uint16 
00637 NParam::incGetUint16( uint32& index ) const {
00638    uint16 r = ntohs(*((uint16 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00639    index += 2;
00640    return r;
00641 }
00642 
00643 inline int16 
00644 NParam::getInt16( uint16 index ) const {
00645    return ntohs(*((int16 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00646 }

00648 inline int16 
00649 NParam::incGetInt16( uint32& index ) const {
00650    int16 r = ntohs(*((int16 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00651    index += 2;
00652    return r;
00653 }

00655 inline uint32
00656 NParam::getUint32FromByteArray( const byte* b, uint16 index ) {
00657    return ntohl(*((uint32 *)(b+index)));
00658 }
00659 
00660 inline uint32 
00661 NParam::getUint32( uint16 index ) const {
00662    return getUint32FromByteArray( &m_buff.front(), index );
00663 }
00664 
00665 inline uint32 
00666 NParam::incGetUint32( uint32& index ) const {
00667    uint32 r = getUint32FromByteArray( &m_buff.front(), index );
00668    index += 4;
00669    return r;
00670 }
00671 
00672 inline int32 
00673 NParam::getInt32( uint16 index ) const {
00674    return ntohl(*((int32 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00675 }
00676 
00677 inline int32 
00678 NParam::incGetInt32( uint32& index ) const {
00679    int32 r = ntohl(*((int32 *)(&(m_buff.front())+index)));
00680    index += 4;
00681    return r;
00682 }
00683 
00684 inline MC2String 
00685 NParam::getString( bool usesLatin1 ) const {
00686    MC2String str = reinterpret_cast<const char*> (&m_buff.front());
00687    if( usesLatin1 ) {
00688       return UTF8Util::isoToMc2(str);
00689    } else {
00690       return UTF8Util::utf8ToMc2(str);
00691    }
00692 }
00693 
00694 
00695 inline MC2String 
00696 NParam::incGetString( bool usesLatin1, uint32& index ) const {
00697    MC2String str = reinterpret_cast<const char*> (&m_buff.front() + index);
00698    index += str.length() + 1;
00699    if( usesLatin1 ) {
00700       return UTF8Util::isoToMc2(str);
00701    } else {
00702       return UTF8Util::utf8ToMc2(str);
00703    }
00704 }

00713 inline uint16
00714 NParam::getUint16Array( uint16 index ) const {

00720 NParam::getUint32Array( uint16 index ) const {

00725 inline int32
00726 NParam::getInt32Array( uint16 index ) const {

00730 
00731 inline void
00732 NParam::writeTo( vector< byte >& buff ) const {
00733    buff.push_back( ( m_paramID ) >> 8 );
00734    buff.push_back( ( m_paramID ) & 0xff );
00735    buff.push_back( ( m_buff.size() ) >> 8 );
00736    buff.push_back( ( m_buff.size() ) & 0xff );
00737    buff.insert( buff.end(), m_buff.begin(), m_buff.end() );
00738 }

00741 inline bool 
00742 NParam::operator < ( const NParam& b ) const {
00743    return m_paramID < b.m_paramID;
00744 }
00745 
00746 
00747 inline bool 
00748 NParam::operator > ( const NParam& b ) const {
00749    return m_paramID > b.m_paramID;
00750 }
00751 
00752 
00753 inline bool 
00754 NParam::operator != ( const NParam& b ) const {
00755    return m_paramID != b.m_paramID;
00756 }
00757 
00758 
00759 inline bool 
00760 NParam::operator == ( const NParam& b ) const {
00761    return m_paramID == b.m_paramID;
00762 }
